Class FoodDAO

java.lang.Object
FoodDAO
public class FoodDAO extends Object
FoodDAO class This DAO class holds a method to test connection to the database and SQLite CRUD methods food products from the database.

Connection testing method included is connectDB() . CRUD methods in this class include ListProducts() , FindProduct(int ID), AddProduct(FoodProduct product), UpdateProduct(FoodProduct product) and DeleteProduct(int ID).

Since:
Corretto-17
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tiarnaigh Downey-Webb. MMU ID: 19092488.

      Returns:
      An ArrayList of FoodProducts in database.

    • findProduct

      public FoodProduct findProduct(int ID)
      findProduct() Finds a food product in the database from an inputted product ID.
      Parameters:
      ID - ID of the queried FoodProduct.
      Returns:
      FoodProduct with matching ID.

    • addProduct

      public boolean addProduct(FoodProduct product)
      addProduct() Adds a food product to the database with user inputted SKU, description, category and price.
      Parameters:
      product - New product to be added.
      Returns:
      True if >0 rows inserted, otherwise false.

    • updateProduct

      public boolean updateProduct(FoodProduct product)
      updateProduct() Finds an existing food product in the database via its product ID. Updates any element of this product manually inputted by the user.
      Parameters:
      product - FoodProduct to be updated
      Returns:
      True if >0 rows updated, otherwise false.

    • deleteProduct

      public boolean deleteProduct(int ProductID)
      deleteProduct() Deletes a product specified by the user via product ID.
      Parameters:
      ProductID - ID of product to be deleted
      Returns:
      True if rows deleted == 1, otherwise false.

    • searchProducts

      public ArrayList<FoodProduct> searchProducts(String Description)
      searchProducts() Searches FoodProduct table in the database for entries matching the user inputted description, using SQL query.
      Parameters:
      Description - Description of food product searched.
      Returns:
      searchResults . Returns arrayList of food products with descriptions LIKE user inputted description / query.

    • filterProducts

      public ArrayList<FoodProduct> filterProducts(String Category)
      filterProducts() Filters products in the SQLite database FoodProduct table via user inputted product category.
      Parameters:
      Category - queried category to be searched and filtered from the database.
      Returns:
      filteredResults. Returns arrayList of food products matching queried category.
